htmlform.formName: HMIS 003 HIV Care ART Card - Clinical Assessment
htmlform.formDescription: A visit for a client for clinical assessment

div.h1: 003 HIV Care/ART CARD - Clinical Assessment Form

obs.answerLabels: 1. ART Initiation, 2. ART Refill, 3. ART Regimen Switch/ Substitution, 4. Viral Load, 5. CD4, 6. IAC, 7. T.B Drug Refill,8. T.B Follow up, 9. ANC,10. EID,11. PMTCT, 12. Hypertension/ Diabetes, 13. Nutrition,14. Other Specify
Normal, Moderate Acute Malnutrition, Severe Acute Malnutrition, Severe Acute Malnutrition with Oedema, Overweight/Obese
Therapeutic Feeding (F75 F100 RUTF), Supplementary Feeding (Flour, oil, sugar, etc), Infant and Young Child Feeding Counselling ( > 2yrs), Nutrition Counselling only (if > 2yrs)

obs.answerLabel: Not pregnant or not breast feeding

div.label: Intention to concieve in the next three months

obs.answerLabels: 1. No signs,2. Suspect,3. Diagnosed with Tb,4. Tb Rx
H0: Never Initiated,H1: On INH,H2: Defaulted,H3: Taken off due to side effects,H4: Completed

obs.answerLabel: Cough or shortness of breath > 1 week
Fever, chills or night sweats > 1 week
Red/purple or dark spots on skin

obs.answerLabels: No symptoms,Symptomatic Non-Reactive,Symptomatic Reactive,Symptomatic Reactive and treated

div.label: Severe
div.small: if CD4 less than 15% write minus(-) if CD4 >15 write plus (+)
